page.title: 07CLUBS-Longton W. I.
page.content: {Longton Group}has over 100 members and a waiting list. As the village grew, another Institute was formed and called{Longton Marsh.}Both groups use the same hall but work as separate units run by separate committees. Variety shows are a speciallity of {Longton Institute}which entertains the old people of the village at a free Christmas party with tea and a present for everyone. The group has appeared at national events and won several awards including a first at Scene 80. Each week between 50 and 80 ladies attend the meetings which are arranged on a rota basis by members from small areas of Longton and Hutton. A{weekly market}for home produced goods moved from Leyland this year and is very popular. All craft, produce or jams are strictly quality controlled before they are allowed on sale.
